144        SteelBlue(0x46, 0x82, 0xB4),
145        Tan(0xD2, 0xB4, 0x8C),
146        Teal(0x00, 0x80, 0x80),
147        Thistle(0xD8, 0xBF, 0xD8),
148        Tomato(0xFF, 0x63, 0x47),
149        Turquoise(0x40, 0xE0, 0xD0),
150        Violet(0xEE, 0x82, 0xEE),
151        Wheat(0xF5, 0xDE, 0xB3),
152        White(0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF),
153        WhiteSmoke(0xF5, 0xF5, 0xF5),
154        Yellow(0xFF, 0xFF, 0x00),
155        YellowGreen(0x9A, 0xCD, 0x32);
156        
157        private final int r, g, b;
158
159        CssColor(int r, int g, int b) {
160                this.r = r;
161                this.g = g;
162                this.b = b;
163        }
164        
165        @Override
166        public Color getColor() {
167                return new Color(r, g, b);
168        }
169
170
171//      public String getRGBString() {
172//              /*
173//               * toHexString will return "0" instead of "00" String.format will not
174//               * 0-pad Strings or Hex Have to do it manually...
175//               */
176//              return String.format("#%s%s%s",
177//                              (r < 0x10 ? "0" : "") + Integer.toHexString(r), (g < 0x10 ? "0"
178//                                              : "") + Integer.toHexString(g), (b < 0x10 ? "0" : "")
179//                                              + Integer.toHexString(b));
180//      }
181        
182
183        public static Color[] getColors(CssColor... selectColors) {
184                Color[] rgbColors = new Color[selectColors.length];
185                for (int i = 0; i < selectColors.length; i++) {
186                        rgbColors[i] = selectColors[i].getColor();
187                }
188                return rgbColors;
189        }
190        
191        public static final Color[] PreferredColors =
192                        getColors(
193                                        MediumBlue,
194                                        Crimson,
195                                        MediumSeaGreen,
196                                        BlueViolet,
197                                        Tomato,
198                                        CornFlowerBlue,
199                                        DeepPink,
200                                        YellowGreen,
201                                        Magenta,
202                                        //OliveDrab,
203                                        DarkCyan
204                                        );
205
206}
